articles.author: Ben Church, CNN
articles.title: Ashleigh Barty becomes first Australian woman to win Wimbledon single's title in 41 years - CNN International
articles.description: Ashleigh Barty clinched her first Wimbledon title after beating Karolina Pliskova 6-3 6-7 (4-7) 6-3 in the women's final on Saturday.

articles.description: All of Australia is cheering for Ash Barty but she's not good for her fans' nerves.
articles.content:
